DOC.brief_title: Plasmakinetic Enucleation Prostate Treat Benign Prostatic Hypertrophy Patients With Large Prostate
DOC.detailed_description: Despite availability numerous minimally invasive alternative , monopolar transurethral resection prostate ( TURP ) remain frequently perform operation benign prostatic hypertrophy ( BPH ) small moderate size prostate . Nevertheless , TURP large prostate associate various complication unsatisfactory long-term result . B-TURP PkEP prove favorable postoperative outcome monopolar TURP . But whether B-TURP PkEP good remain controversial . We aim compare perioperative postoperative character PkEP B-TURP BPH patient large prostate . Moreover , evaluate long-term result approach .
DOC.criteria: Qmax < 10 mL/s , IPSS > 19 Age 50 70 year Prostate volume 70 200 mL , determine TRUS , medical therapy failure . Patients neurogenic bladder Urethral stricture Bladder tumor Prostate cancer previous prostate bladder neck Urethral surgery PSA > 4ng/ml , receive prostate biopsy within 3 month
